text: Tavʙai kasone qaʙul karda namesavad, ki korhoi ʙad ancom medihand, to in ki margi jake az onho nazdik savad, megujad: "Aknun tavʙa kardam". Va qaʙul karda namesavad tavʙai kasone, ki memirand, dar hole ki onho kofir hastand. Onho kasone hastand, ki ʙarojason azoʙi dardnoke omoda kardaem. (Tavʙa kardan dar holati faro rasidani marg, tavʙai macʙuri ast va ʙa tavʙakunanda foidae nadorad. Balki tavʙae foidaovar ast, ki on az rui ixtijor ʙosad)
